tag_list: designmind, business-intelligence, san-francisco-sql-server-user-group, sql-server, -net, sharepoint, microsoft-gold-partner
overview:
Mark is President of DesignMind, a custom software, database, and Business Intelligence in San Francisco, California. He’s a well known member of the San Francisco Bay Area software community.

Mark leads the San Francisco and Silicon Valley SQL Server User Groups, and the San Francisco Bay Area Microsoft Business Intelligence User Group. Through leadership in these organizations, Mark plays a pivotal role in providing learning and networking opportunities to technology and business professionals throughout the Bay Area.

DesignMind is a Microsoft Certified Gold Partner with expertise in .NET, SQL Server, Microsoft Business Intelligence, and SharePoint.

video_embeds.description: San Francisco and Silicon Valley User Groups
